palangati senawak men ashwa senawa+ ragena yuddhayata enna. 28 babiloniyata wiruddhawa yuddhayata yamata jathinwada mediyawe rajawarunwada+ ehi aandukarayanwada siyalu niladharinwada owun yatathe thibena deshawala wasiyanwada sudanam karanna. 29 siyaludena pudumayata path karamin babiloniya kisi miniseku wasaya nokarana palu sthanayak bawata path kirimata yehowa dewi thiranaya kara atha.+ ebawin polowa dedarum kanneya.
aaye magen wadak na!
ee wadath ekka wyapara kshethrayata awadhanaya yomu karanna apahasu nisa thawakalikawa wyapara katayuthu nawathwannata thiranaya kala.
ehi ithamath sumihiri wadan thulin sithata labena sisila ananthaya.
janadhipathi maithripala sirisena mahatha idiriyedi pudgalika rohalak wana malambae newil pranandu shikshana rohala rajayata pawara ganime giwisumata me wanawita athsan thaba thibenawa.

sesu apanayana bhoga aadayama a.do.miliyana 315 k wu athara, eya 4.7% ka ihala yamaki.thawada ema mandalaya nikuth kala adala sankhyalekhana anuwa 2014 wasare agosthu masa pamanak salakimedi apanayana aadayama a.do.miliyana 978 kwu athara, juli masaye apanayana aadayama wu a.do.miliyana 955 ha sasandimedi eya 2.4% ka wardhanayak pennum karannaki.idiripathwa thibu sankirna mattame gatalu 35 k atharin 25% k sandaha kshanika wisandum labadimata hakiwimath, sesu eewa wadidura wimarshanaya kota awashya piliyam yedimata adala ansha wala awadhanaya yomukarawimath mewara sansadaye kapi penena siddhiyak wiya.me gatalu walin wadi pramanayak watbadu prathipurnaya kirima pramadawimata adala eewa wiya.shri lanka apanayana sanwardhana mandalaye sabhapathi, bandula egodage, adhyaksha janaral sujatha wirakon, widhayaka adhyakshaka, yusuf ke.marikkar, karmantha ha wanija katayuthu amathyanshaye athireka lekam, sitha senarathna yana mahathwarun saha mahathminda sahabhagi wu athara, apanayana samagam 110 ka niyojithayinda, wanija mandala niyojithayanda, maha bhandagaraya, shri lanka maha bankuwa, mudal amathyanshaya, karmantha ha wanija katayuthu amathyanshaya, shri lanka apanayana sanwardhana mandalaya, wana sampath departhamenthuwa, shri lanka pramithi aayathanaya, shri lanka aayojana mandalaya, wanija departhamenthuwa, idam prathisanskarana komishan sabhawa, sathwa nishpadana ha saukhya departhamenthuwa, aanayana apanayana palana departhamenthuwa, kamkaru departhamenthuwa, welanda thirubadu saha aayojana prathipaththi departhamenthuwa, jathika jalasampadana ha jalapawahana mandalaya, waraya adhikariya, guwansewa, aadayam badu departhamenthuwa, shri lanka reguwa ha widulibala mandalaya niyojanaya karamin rajya niladharin ha pradhanin wishala pirisakda, me awasthawata pamina sitiyaha.
